    # 树形弹窗

    选中的值: [ { "id": "014557484S-1-0017", "name": "尼古拉斯.赵" } ]

    机构
    已选1项

    尼古拉斯.赵 

        <template>
        <p>选中的值: {{selectedData}}</p>   
        <Button @click="isModalShow = !isModalShow">打开</Button>
        <TreeModal :list-data="listData"
            width="800"
            height="600"
            :isShow="isModalShow"
            @toggleShow="v => isModalShow= v"
            :title="title"
            v-model="selectedData"
            mask
            draggable
            controllerColor="#fff"
            activeColor="#fff"
            :reflectKey="{
                key: 'name',
                value: 'id'
            }"
            ></TreeModal>
    </template>
    <script>
    export default {
        name: 'SomeComponent',
        props: {},
        data(){
            return {
                isModalShow: true,
                title:'机构',
                selectedData:[
                    {
                        id: '014557484S-1-0017',
                        name: '尼古拉斯.赵',
                    }
                ],
                listData:{
                    id: '014557484S',
                    name: '特殊事务部',
                    expand: true,
                    children:[
                        {
                            id: '014557484S-1',
                            name: '后勤',
                            children: [
                                {
                                    id: '014557484S-1-0017',
                                    name: '尼古拉斯.赵',
                                }
                            ],
                        },
                        {
                            id: '014557484S-2',
                            name: '业务部',
                            expand: true,
                            children:[
                                {
                                    id: '014557484S-2-1',
                                    name: '一组',
                                },
                                {
                                    id: '014557484S-2-2',
                                    name: '二组',
                                    expand: true,
                                    children: [
                                         {
                                            id: '014557484S-2-2-0017',
                                            name: '谢广坤',
                                         },
                                    ],
                                },
                            ]
                        },
                    ]
                },

            }           
        }
    }
    </script>
